name: Stalker 2D
description:
PLEASE, PLAY THIS GAME ON A CHROMIUM-BASED BROWSER. I HAVE HAD REPORTS FROM PEOPLE WHO WHINED THAT MY GAMES DON'T WORK PROPERLY AND I THINK HTML5 + ITS IMPLEMENTATION IN FIREFOX IS TO BLAME FOR THIS.

Stalker 2D is a remake of my game called Stalker. Instead of being a RPG with a top-down perspective, it is a platformer and a sidescroller. It was created in GDevelop for the Remake Game Jam.

Much like the original game, this game includes:

  1. Stealth and stealth-like elements.
  2. A very primitive inventory management.
  3. Horror elements like an unsettling atmosphere and chases.

Note that unlike the original, it took me less than 1.5 weeks to make while the original was made in a few months, so not all the content is there yet and that's assuming I even want to work on this past the jam.

Controls

I programmed the game with the intention to allow the player to rebind controls, but for now this is what you get:

Movements = Arrow keys

Return to main menu (From tutorial) = Escape key

Sprint = Left Shift

Jump = Space key

Interact = Left Control

Shuffle selected item = Tab key

Use item = "P" key

Attributions

Royalty free or public domain assets are not included!
